site_url.description: The URL of the site for which search analytics data is being provided.

search_type.description: The type of search performed (e.g., web search, image search, video search).

date.description: The date for which the search analytics data is provided.

device.description: The type of device used by the user for the search query (e.g., desktop, mobile).

clicks.description: The total number of times a user clicked on a search result linking to the target site.

impressions.description: The total number of times a user saw a link to the target site in search results.

ctr.description: Click-through rate represents the ratio of clicks to impressions, showing the effectiveness of your site in attracting clicks from search results.

position.description: The average position of the site's URLs in search results for the given query or queries.
